original_text: The God of Abraham, Isaac and Jacob, the God of our fathers, has glorified his servant Jesus. You handed him over to be killed, and you disowned him before Pilate, though he had decided to let him go.
korean_text: 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱의 하나님 곧 우리 조상의 하나님이 그의 종 예수를 영화롭게 하셨느니라 너희가 그를 넘겨 주고 빌라도가 놓아 주기로 결의한 것을 너희가 그 앞에서 거부하였으니

sentences.original_text: The God of Abraham, Isaac and Jacob
You handed him over to be killed
and you disowned him before Pilate
though he had decided to let him go
